github_body:
General changes:
    * #230 On the /affixes page, the preset for the affix is now displayed. This should aid you in selecting the proper beguiling preset for your route. By default, the beguiling preset is now also set to the current preset which is active for your region (based on profile settings).
    * #232 Required fields are now highlighted in orange (the asterisk).
Bugfixes:
    * #231 Fixed an issue where cloning a public route would fail unless it was owned by you.
discord_body:
v2.7.2 (2019/08/25)(https://keystone.guru/release/v2.7.2)
General changes:
    * #230 On the /affixes page, the preset for the affix is now displayed. This should aid you in selecting the proper beguiling preset for your route. By default, the beguiling preset is now also set to the current preset which is active for your region (based on profile settings).
    * #232 Required fields are now highlighted in orange (the asterisk).

Bugfixes:
    * #231 Fixed an issue where cloning a public route would fail unless it was owned by you.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v2.7.2](https://keystone.guru/release/v2.7.2)

General changes:
* [\#230](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/230) On the /affixes page, the preset for the affix is now displayed. This should aid you in selecting the proper beguiling preset for your route. By default, the beguiling preset is now also set to the current preset which is active for your region (based on profile settings).
* [\#232](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/232) Required fields are now highlighted in orange (the asterisk).

Bugfixes:
* [\#231](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/231) Fixed an issue where cloning a public route would fail unless it was owned by you.

changes.change: On the /affixes page, the preset for the affix is now displayed. This should aid you in selecting the proper beguiling preset for your route. By default, the beguiling preset is now also set to the current preset which is active for your region (based on profile settings).
Required fields are now highlighted in orange (the asterisk).
Fixed an issue where cloning a public route would fail unless it was owned by you.
